00003 require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/../support/IReader.php');

00008 class C16Frame extends SpriteFrame
00009 {
00011     private $encoding;
00012 
00013     private $lineOffset = array();
00014 
00015     private $reader;
00016     private $offset;

00026     public function C16Frame($reader,$encoding='565')
00027     {
00028         if($reader instanceof IReader) {
00029             $this->reader = $reader;
00030             $this->encoding = $encoding;
00031             $this->offset = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00032 
00033             $width = $this->reader->ReadInt(2);
00034             $height = $this->reader->ReadInt(2);
00035 
00036             parent::SpriteFrame($width,$height);
00037 
00038             for($x = 0; $x < ($height - 1); $x++)
00039             {
00040                 $this->lineOffset[$x] = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00041             }
00042         } else if(is_resource($reader)) {
00043             if(get_resource_type($reader) == 'gd') {
00044 
00045                 $this->encoding = ($encoding=='555')?'555':'565';
00046                 parent::SpriteFrame(imagesx($reader),imagesy($reader),true);
00047                 $this->gdImage = $reader;
00048             }
00049         } else {
00050             throw new Exception('$reader must be an IReader or gd image resource.');
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054     // @brief Sets the encoding to use when compiling
00055     public function SetEncoding($encoding) {
00056         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00057         $this->encoding = $encoding;
00058     }
00059 
00061 
00063 
00066     protected function Decode()
00067     {     
00068         $image = imagecreatetruecolor($this->GetWidth(),
00069             $this->GetHeight());
00070         $this->reader->Seek($this->offset);
00071         for($y = 0; $y < $this->GetHeight(); $y++)
00072         {
00073             for($x = 0; $x < $this->GetWidth();)
00074             {
00075                 $run = $this->reader->ReadInt(2);
00076                 if(($run & 0x0001) > 0)
00077                     $run_type = "colour";
00078                 else
00079                     $run_type = "black";
00080                 $run_length = ($run & 0x7FFF) >> 1;
00081                 if($run_type == "black")
00082                 {
00083                     $z = $x + $run_length;
00084                     for(;$x < $z; $x++)
00085                     {
00086                         imagesetpixel($image, $x, $y, imagecolorallocate($image, 0, 0, 0));
00087                     }
00088                 }
00089                 else //colour run
00090                 {
00091                     $z = $x + $run_length;
00092                     for(;$x < $z; $x++)
00093                     {
00094                         $pixel = $this->reader->ReadInt(2);
00095                         if($this->encoding == "565")
00096                         {
00097                             $red   = ($pixel & 0xF800) >> 8;
00098                             $green = ($pixel & 0x07E0) >> 3;
00099                             $blue  = ($pixel & 0x001F) << 3;
00100                         }
00101                         else if($this->encoding == "555")
00102                         {
00103                             $red   = ($pixel & 0x7C00) >> 7;
00104                             $green = ($pixel & 0x03E0) >> 2;
00105                             $blue  = ($pixel & 0x001F) << 3;
00106                         }
00107                         $colour = imagecolorallocate($image, $red, $green, $blue);
00108                         imagesetpixel($image, $x, $y, $colour);
00109                     }
00110                 }
00111                 if($x == $this->GetWidth())
00112                     $this->reader->Skip(2);
00113             }
00114         }
00115         $this->gdImage = $image;
00116         return $image;
00117     }
00119 
00121 
00125     public function Encode() {
00126         $data = '';
00127         $lineOffsets = array();
00128         for($y = 0; $y < $this->GetHeight(); $y++) {
00129             $wasblack = 0;
00130             $runlength = 0;
00131             if($y > 0) {
00132                 $lineOffsets[] = strlen($data);
00133             }
00134             $colourRunData = '';
00135             for($x = 0; $x < $this->GetWidth(); $x++) {
00136 
00137                 $pixel = $this->GetPixel($x,$y);
00138                 if($pixel['red'] > 255 || $pixel['green'] > 255 || $pixel['blue'] > 255) {
00139                     throw new Exception('Pixel colour out of range.');
00140                 }
00141                 $newpixel = 0;
00142                 if($this->encoding == '555') {
00143                     $newpixel = (($pixel['red'] << 7) & 0xF800) | (($pixel['green'] << 2) & 0x03E0) | (($pixel['blue'] >> 3) & 0x001F);
00144                 } else {
00145                     $newpixel = (($pixel['red'] << 8) & 0xF800) | (($pixel['green'] << 3) & 0x07E0) | (($pixel['blue'] >> 3) & 0x001F);
00146                 }
00147 
00148 
00149                 // if isblack !== wasblack
00150                 if(($newpixel == 0) !== $wasblack || $runlength > 32766) {
00151                     //end the run if this isn't the first run
00152                     if($wasblack !== 0) {
00153 
00154                         //output data.
00155                         print "Ending run \n";
00156                         $run = $runlength << 1;
00157                         if($wasblack) {
00158                             $data .= pack('v',$run);
00159 
00160                         } else {
00161                             $run = $run | 1;
00162                             $data .= pack('v',$run);
00163                             $data .= $colourRunData;
00164                             $colourRunData = '';
00165                         }
00166                     }
00167                     //start a new run
00168                     if($newpixel == 0) {
00169                         print "Starting new black run \n";
00170                         $wasblack = true;
00171                         $colourRunData = '';
00172                     } else {
00173                         print "Starting new colour run \n";
00174                         $wasblack = false;
00175                         $colourRunData = pack('v',$newpixel);
00176                     }
00177                     $runlength = 1;
00178 
00179                 } else {
00180                     if(!$wasblack) {
00181                         $colourRunData .= pack('v',$newpixel);
00182                     }
00183                     $runlength++;
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 if($x == ($this->GetWidth()-1)) {
00187                     //end run and output data.
00188                     $run = $runlength << 1;
00189                     if($wasblack) {
00190                         $data .= pack('v',$run);
00191 
00192                     } else {
00193                         $run = $run | 1;
00194                         $data .= pack('v',$run);
00195                         $data .= $colourRunData;
00196                         $colourRunData = '';
00197                     }
00198                 }
00199             }
00200             //line terminating zero tag.
00201             $data .= pack('xx');
00202         }
00203         //image terminating zero tag
00204         $data .= pack('xx');
00205         return array('lineoffsets' => $lineOffsets, 'data' => $data);
00206     }
00207 }
